concept.title: Use Model Space Viewports
concept.shortdesc: You can do the following operations at the model space viewport:

ul.li: Set Grid, and UCS icon modes; Pan; Zoom; and restore named views.
Save orientations of UCS with individual viewports.
When executing a command, you can draw fromone viewport to another.
Name a viewport arrangement in order so you can reuse it on the Model tab or insert it on a layout tab.
When you work on 3D models, it is much help that setting up different UCS in individual viewports.
